âœ… WD-40 on the hinge? Sure, it works... for about a week. Most videos show the spray-and-pray method.

âš ï¸ What they miss: WD-40 is a solvent, not a lubricant. It'll dry out and the squeak comes back. Also, if the hinge pin is bent or worn, no amount of lube fixes that.

---

ğŸ’¡ George's Pro Tip: Pull the hinge pin, coat it in white lithium grease or petroleum jelly, tap it back in. That's a permanent fix. Takes 2 minutes.
